mapper.select: SELECT a.annotation_id AS id, a.dataset_id AS datasetId, a.annotation_type AS annotationType, a.updated_at AS updatedAt, a.created_at AS createdAt, a.is_deleted AS isDeleted, a.class_items AS classItems, a.annotation_path AS annotationPath FROM annotation a WHERE a.dataset_id = #{datasetId} AND a.is_deleted = 0
